metadata.name: Ninja Mfer #1
metadata.description:
Ninja mfers are a derivative collection inspired by [Ninja Squad](https://opensea.io/collection/ninja-squad-official) and [mfers](https://opensea.io/collection/mfers) by sartoshi. 

It is the first derivative collection minted entirely with the use of a utility token! 

Learn more about Ninja mfers [here](https://ninjasquad.medium.com/were-all-ninja-mfers-after-all-f6c837aa476d).  Join the squad.

!poof

[Get live updates on our Twitter](https://twitter.com/ninjasquadnft)
[Join the community in our Discord](https://discord.com/invite/ninjasquad)
